en.title: MYSORE PROGRAMME
en.subtitle: Ashtanga Yoga · Traditional Practice
en.intro: Mysore style is the most traditional way to practise Ashtanga Yoga. Each student practises a fixed sequence at their own pace and from memory, whilst the teacher provides individualised guidance and adjustments.

teacher.name: Xibo Eric
teacher.title: Discipline · Focus · Progressive Guidance
teacher.intro: Each practitioner embodies a unique inner landscape and individual rhythm of growth. My online classes are built upon daily practice, sharing insights and wisdom that emerge organically. As a fellow traveller, I walk alongside you on this journey of unifying knowledge and action, supporting yoga as it evolves from a mat-based practice into an art of living.

features.title: Traditional Method
features.description: Based on the traditional Ashtanga practice method

features.title: Individual Attention
features.description: Practice adjustments based on individual circumstances and progress

features.title: Continuous Refinement
features.description: Cultivate patience and inner awareness through repetitive practice

zh.title: 迈索尔课程
zh.subtitle: 阿斯汤加瑜伽 · 传统练习
zh.intro: 迈索尔课程是阿斯汤加瑜伽最传统的练习方式。学员根据个人节奏与记忆练习固定序列，老师在此过程中提供个性化指导与辅助调整

teacher.name: 希波 Eric
teacher.title: 自律 · 专注 · 精进指导
teacher.intro: 每位练习者，都有其独特的内在风景与成长节奏。我的线上课程，以每日练习为土壤，分享由此生发的体悟与智慧。我以同行者之姿，陪伴你踏上这趟知行合一的探索之旅，让瑜伽从垫上的练习，成为生活的艺术。
